articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, Laura Ly and Kiely Westhoff, CNN
articles.title: Indiana becomes first state post-Roe to pass law banning most abortions
articles.description: Indiana Gov. Eric Holcomb on Friday signed a bill that would ban most abortions -- the first state to pass a restrictive law against the procedure since Roe v. Wade was overturned earlier this summer.
articles.content: Indiana Gov. Eric Holcomb on Friday signed a bill that would ban most abortions -- the first state to pass a restrictive law against the procedure since Roe v. Wade was overturned earlier this summer.
